rules_text:
When Bereaved Genius enters, create a tapped Treasure token.
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.)[/i]
rules_text2: When Mechanical Child dies, you may have a noncreature artifact you control become a copy of it.
flavor_text2: [i]After the tragic loss of her first son, Dr. Yumi decided that her second would be made of steel and infinitely repairable.[/i]
